name: IguaRPG
summary: Be an iguana and save the world from evil.

name: Ignis Dei
summary: Heralded by a comet, seen as a harbinger of doom, the Black Death arrived in Florence in 1348. Wander through the woods to escape the plague, face various riddles and encounter mysterious creatures.

name: Ignistone
summary: Ignistone is a roguelike game in which players must devise a combination of weapons and amulets to progress through a dungeon. Whether you prefer attack power, durability, or special moves, find the combination that suits you best.

name: Ignition Arena
summary: Ignition Arena is a competitive space combat game where players build and customize their own starships to engage in intense PvP battles. Set in a futuristic arena, the game emphasizes strategic shipbuilding and fast-paced combat. Players can choose from a wide array of ship components, including weapons, armor, and equipment, to create their ideal battle-ready vessel. With a focus on skill-based gameplay, Ignition Arena offers a dynamic multiplayer experience where tactics and customization are key to victory.

name: iGP Manager
summary: iGP Manager is a massively-multiplayer online motorsport manager game. Hire drivers and engineers, develop your car and technology, find the best car setups and race in real-time multiplayer, formulating the best tactics to win with your friends and opponents. The race engine features rich 3D graphics and real-time weather, streamed directly from weather stations at real-world race circuits, with a slick interface to make strategy decisions and send orders to your team. Your decisions in every race impact the outcome of the championship.

name: I Got Hired To Guard The Button That Destroys The Earth
summary: An indie waiting game that is going to test your patience and focus. Become the most successful button guardian on Steam with Steam Leaderboard

name: Igo: Kyuu Roban Taikyoku
summary:
A Japan-only Go game developed and published by Bullet-Proof Software for the Famicom Disk System.

Igo: Kyuu Roban Taikyoku ("Go: 9 Row Grid Boardgame") is a Go video game that was originally released for the Famicom Disk System on August 11, 1987 in Japan. It was the first Famicom game developed by Bullet-Proof Software: a development studio operating out of Hawaii that would later be responsible for Nintendo's version of Tetris, among other games. This version of Go is better suited for beginners, as it contains simpler 9x9 grids rather than the regulation 19x19.

Igo: Kyuu Roban Taikyoku has a credit for Edge Computing on its title screen; it is assumed some of the game's coding was taken from Edge's C64 game Micro Go.

name: Igo-Shinan '93
summary: 1993 edition of the popular go teaching game.

name: Ignifugo
summary: Ignifugo is a top-down action roguelite with auto-battler elements. Control a combat shell and modify it with auto-attacking units. Take advantage of class bonuses, items and abilities to create unique builds as you fight heated battles through five biomes. Will you survive or be reduced to ash?

name: Ignis Universia: Awakening of the Erudite Empress
summary: Ignis Universia is a cute and funny JRPG and Visual Novel mix with a seasoning of tongue-in-cheek story that references to old genre classics. May contain references to stereotypes and clichés (RPG, fantasy, music, anime and small doses of other nerdy interests).

name: Ignis Universia: Eternal Sisters Saga DX
summary: Ignis Universia: Eternal Sister Saga is a short but epic visual novel/JRPG made for Ludum Dare 45 by a small team in Tampere, Finland.

name: I Gooned at My Grandmas Crib at 2 AM While My Mom Wasnt Watching
summary: The game consists of gooning at your grandmas crib at 2 am while your mom isnt watching, you have to goon at your grandmas crib (at 2 am) while avoiding your mother and other cribmates. It's a short game, a successful run would take about 20 minutes. In-game guide goes further in depth.

name: Ignition 2000: Origins
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of street racing, go on an adventure on those 2000s summer nights. Take care of your ride, upgrade it, customize it! Unlock and explore cars never seen before, discover new roads, take up new challenges! Or just go on a relaxing night run, it's up to you!

name: IGPX
summary:
IGPX was a Toonami game that was available to play on cartoonnetwork.com and toonami.com beginning on September 15, 2003. The game was sponsored by JAK II for the PS2 (SONY). The game was created to coincide with the IGPX Total Immersion Event, with each level opening each day during the event. Daily game codes were also given during the Toonami broadcast which could be used to unlock weapons.
The page for the game on cartoonnetwork.com also kept a running tally during the 5-day event to track which team had won more battles. Despite Team Suzaku being the protagonists of the mini-series, Team Sledge Mamma won 61% of the total battles. The game is no longer available at cartoonnetwork.com, but has been archived by fans.

name: IGT Slots Paradise Garden
summary: Reel in the fun with IGT Slots Paradise Garden. A brand new slots collection from the world’s leading slot machine manufacturer. Enjoy the heart-racing thrill of true casino excitement on your PC/Mac. Try your hand at 15 slots that bring real life sights and sounds into your own home!

name: iGrow Game
summary:
The new age of farming is here on steam! Not the typical farming game or simulator you will find anywhere else.

iGrow Game is a single player cannabis growing game for windows PC. iGrow game is the only cannabis growing game available in 3D and in first person. Start your own cannabis growing factory in a grimy tower block based in the UK. Your goal is to take over and become the best grower around using the best equipment. Unlock equipment and new cannabis strains to sell to the highest ranked dealers to get the best price for your cannabis. The better price you get the more xp you will receive.

Dealers buy depending on criteria such as dryness and potency. You can harvest a lot more wet cannabis then you can with dry cannabis, the quality will be greatly reduced despite high potency. Depending on rank, some dealers will not buy wet cannabis buds no matter what cannabis strain it is.

Every game is different, the tower block is generated at the beginning of a new game. So dealers and rooms available to buy, will be in randomly generated positions. There's 4 ranks of dealers and the higher rank's are higher up in the 10 floor tower block. Move between floors by lift.

Equipment effects your plants final yield and potency so make sure you upgrade between grows. 


- Unlock and grow over 30 different strains of cannabis.

- Unlock and buy containers, hydroponics, lights, reflectors and fan systems.

- Grow up to 8 plants per room.

- Buy over 30 rooms in each generated account.

- Sell your cannabis to build up your weed growing empire!

name: Iglacia
summary: In this drawing-based roguelite, play as a penguin with a stash of powerful crystals to fight off hordes of enemies by drawing and shooting your way to victory!

name: Ignarus
summary:
Ignarus is a Dark old school Action RPG with a story to tell.

There will be experience gained to level up and learn new abilities, as well as challenging monsters and boss battles to test your skills.

Some dungeons and puzzles will test your wits and solving skills and leave you satisfied.

name: Ignited Entry
summary: Ignited Entry is a full length narrative driven psychological horror game with voice acting, dreamish visuals, and horror elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Ignisia
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting journey, explore the vast expanses of Ignisia, where magic, adventure, and powerful enemies await you. Discover an amazing world, uncover ancient secrets, and unite with friends to protect it from the looming threat. Perhaps in the future, you’ll find discoveries you never even imagined…

name: Ignored and Humiliated by Gamer Girls
summary: Hello, it's Aria. It seems some gamers are being cruel to me today and making me lick their feet!! How humiliating!!

name: I Got Isekai'd Into a Shmup
summary: I Got Isekai'd into a Shmup is a vertical shoot'em up game inspired by the best games of the 90s genre, while adding exciting features and local co-op for up to 4 players.

name: I.G.I. Origins
summary: The prequel to 2000's Project I.G.I.: Experience a high octane thrill ride through a spy fantasy world of gadgets and guns against the vivid, sumptuous backdrop of the 1980s. Unravel a mystery that threatens to plunge the world into a new era of nuclear annihilation. You're going in.

name: Ignoble
summary: IGNOBLE is a one-of-a-kind, brutal incremental beat-’em-up platformer. Destroy enemies and harvest blood, bones, and marrow to grow stronger, unlock forbidden skills, and wipe out the Ignoble tyrants who dare threaten your master.

name: I.G.I.-2: Covert Strike
summary:
You're the undercover agent David Jones who's part of the secret agency IGI and in charge to protect the world from international terrorism.

IGI-2: Covert Strike starts where the first part ended. So, again, you have to fight for your own, infiltrate enemy bases, wander through huge outdoor and indoor levels, hack computers and find the best strategy to solve the mission. You could say: a sneaker-shooter!

Additionally, the game features multiplayer support where you can solve missions on special mp-maps.

name: I, Gladiator
summary: A gladiatorial hack-and-slash game.

name: I, Gladiator Scratch'em
summary: I, Gladiator Scratch'em is the prequel to the highly anticipated I, Gladiator full game. The Scratch'em game allows players to win points that lead to a special surprise that can be used in the full game.

name: Ignis Avis Venatio
summary: A visual novel about a young magus whose life takes a drastic turn after a fateful encounter.

name: Ignorance Fighter II: Tour Bus
summary: Fight off a hateful, ignorant ideology manifested as a bus.

name: Igo Meikan
summary: Igo Meikan ("Go Directory") is a go game for the Famicom released by Hect, a developer that specialized in board game to video game adaptations. It is primarily focused on teaching the player to play go like the pros, with the meikan (or directory) in this case being a list of techniques and tactics. As with all versions of go, the goal is to surround the opposing player's pieces, thereby capturing them and removing them from the board. The winner is whoever has the most pieces on the board left when both players have stopped taking turns (usually because there's no more legal moves).

name: IG Arena: Idle RPG
summary:
When the three realms of Heaven, Mortal, and Hell were experiencing a chaotic period, their kings started to become greedy. All of them craving for a throne that could dominate the three realms, and their desire leads them to an epic war that seems to be endless.
Participate with thousands of players in a NEW AFK 5v5 PvP interesting game ever! Summoning immortal gods, build your own squad, collecting gems, diamond, lethal weapons and many more attractive items.
Who will be the Only King? Drown into our addictive Idle RPG battle of Immortal Gods Arena to find out!

name: Iga Ninden Gaiou
summary: A Ninja Gaiden-esque action adventure

name: Igor Maks: The Meme Lord
summary: A fascinating 2D space shooter based on memes. Set off an amazing journey with Igor Maks and reveal the secret of the universe!

name: Ignis Universia: Eternal Sisters Saga
summary: Save the world with the Chosen Sisters in this epic 15 minute adventure!

name: I Got Cucked by a Futanari
summary: Just because you can't please your wife, doesn't mean she can't be pleased...

name: Igo-Shinan '92
summary: The third release in the popular Famicom Go series.

name: Ignited in Cavern
summary: In the waning years of the Northern Wei Dynasty, in the town of Dunhuang, a rumor circulates about a stone statue that bestows blessings in the mortal realm. Anu and Chu Qingqing, rushes to this place only to discover that the merchant holding the stone statue has already met his demise.

name: Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars
summary: Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars, is a VRMMORPG highlighting community and immersion, your adventure takes place in a vast fully interactable 61 x 61 km world with an endless supply of quests, loot, and adventures for you to engage in.

name: IGT Slots: Lucky Larry's Lobstermania
summary: A gambling game featuring licensed slot machines from IGT Slots for the PC and Mac.

name: Ignatius
summary: Ignatius is a atmospheric puzzle-platformer game with an interesting story. The game with its visual form and plot refers to the old silent movies.

name: IgKnight Golf Defender
summary: Not your typical Golf VR simulator! IgKnight warriors use physics based mechanics to golf cannonballs from the top of the castle gates in this tower defense fantasy game.

name: IgKnight Food Fight
summary: Challenge your friends to a food fight in VR! Up to 2v2 multiplayer, with face haptic support and kids mode!

name: I Got Gooned by a Femboy
summary: Desperate times call for desperate measures.

name: IguaRPG 2
summary: This is another fangame of Oddwarg Animal RPG, a Game Maker game from 2003.

name: Igor: Objective Uikokahonia
summary:
Igor, a college student, wants to date the most beautiful girl of his school. Instead he discovers a criminal plot he has to investigate.

The game offers classic 2D point-and-click adventure gameplay. There are actions buttons near the bottom of the screen, as well as an inventory.

name: I Got a Millenary Cat
summary: The injured kitten was brought home... One day she takes on a human form! "I got a millenary cat” is a placement game in which you can observe the life of a cat girl.

name: Iggy's Egg Adventure
summary: Iggy’s Egg Adventure is a prehistoric platformer 75 million years in the making. You play as Iggy, a baby Velociraptor who must rescue his mother from her evil caveman captors, while collecting as many of her eggs as you can along the way. Iggy’s Egg Adventure has a classic platform feel with stylized 3D graphics on a modern gaming engine.

name: Igniter
summary:
Toka and Natsume, who live in the Fire Dragon's territory, reach adulthood on an island of beastmen ruled by dragon.
In accordance with customs passed down in the area, they must visit the Baby Dragon's Den in the eastern forest.
However, a glimpse of something strange happening on this island was happening there...

name: Ignition
summary: A short game inspired by Zelda/Binding of Isaac.

name: Iga Ninden Ga-ou
summary: Iga Ninden Gaou is a action game developed by Cream.

name: IGDB
summary: A co-operative MMORPG where you work with the most incredible people to provide a layer of stability to an industry that does its best break any taxonomy. You play as one of several classes (Data, Engineering, Leadership). Each with its own area of ownership, and dependancies. Alone it is impossible to add value, but by co-operating across the various classes you are able to thwart tight deadlines, aging tech stacks, and troll submissions and in the end form meaningful friendships.

name: Ignis
summary: Ignis is a skill-based game of the battle arena category. The core mechanic is the ability to control trajectories of projectiles. There are also multiple spells of all other sorts: AoE, summoning spells, battle cries, curses. All of those can be dynamically upgraded in-game, allowing through conscious game design for an enemy to be dominated not only by the sheer power of one’s spells, but also by one’s unique playstyle.

name: Iggy's Zombie A-Pug-Alypse
summary: Iggy is a happy-go-lucky Pug that lives in a mansion with the Duchess Bianca. One day Iggy awakes to find the mansion is overrun with Zombies and is Bianca missing. Can you reunite Iggy and Bianca in this action packed Puzzle-Strategy game?

name: Ignition Collection: Volume 1
summary: Ignition Collection: Volume 1 is a compilation of Animal Snap, Super Dropzone and World Tennis Stars

name: Ignite
summary: A Yume Nikki fan game in which players must guide Feutsuki through the dream world beyond their fireplace. This game was released as version 0.01 and was later remade as Ignite: Dying Flame.

name: Igeo DX
summary: Igeo DX is a Sokoban-style puzzler with mechanically simple but challenging gameplay. Push and combine like-shapes to solve increasingly complex spatial and logic puzzles.

name: I, Gladiator
summary: Based on the epic Gladiator movies and games of the past, I,Gladiator brings you the true feeling of gladiatorial combat. Punch them, kick them, hit them, stun them, impale them, dismember them, burn them, destroy them!

name: Iggle Pop! Deluxe
summary: Can you rescue the cuddly Iggles from the evil Zoogs? Move your Iggle friends to their color-coded destinations and pop them out of their bubble prisons. And listen to Doc Iggle... he's got all the tips and tricks you'll need to set the Iggles free!

name: Igneous
summary: Igneous is an action platformer where you play as a tiki totem trying to escape from a raging volcano. By running and jumping, players have to navigate their way through dark caverns, forge raging lava rivers and cross crumbling bridges to make it out of the inferno alive.

name: Iggy & Java
summary: Iggy & Java is a light-hearted puzzle game. You will accompany the lovable characters "Iggy" and "Java" on their journey through various scenarios and rich puzzles.

name: Ignatius: Reunited
summary: Ignatius is a atmospheric puzzle-platformer game with an interesting story. The game with its visual form and plot refers to the old silent movies. Graphic design of "Ignatius" is a unique combination of different aesthetics - hand drawing , noir , vintage , art deco and even steam – punk elements .

name: I got a cat maid
summary: You pick up a cat maid to live together and have physical intimacies in this mini-game. 3 H scenes with 18 variations.

name: I.Game Hong Kong Mahjong
summary:
Looking for someone to play with? Join us for an exciting game of 13 Mahjong!

Now you can play Hong Kong Mahjong on Nintendo Switch, accompanied by authentic Cantonese voice, providing you with the most realistic gaming experience!

name: Ignite
summary: Magic attack by command input, requires precise operation and instantaneous power. The "Score Attack Battle" is all about eliminating large numbers of enemies and surviving longer. How can you conquer "Ignite"? A magical experience like no other!

name: IGKnight
summary: Explore a defined mystical world where magic can be harnessed in the form of Runes. Start as an adventuring knight, and build your skills to become a powerful sorcerer. Go on Quests that are catered to the skills you advance. Use the runes to aid you in combat, crafting , and survival!

name: Igo Club
summary: Igo Club is a Miscellaneous game, published by Hect, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Igeo
summary: Colorful puzzler where you eliminate blocks by pushing them together.

name: Ignite
summary: Every race is different in Ignite. Each race brings something new as players try to win by using their own tactics. The score system in Ignite allows for tactics to be used during a race. Gathering score allows the use of nitro in the race and converts to time bonus at the end. So short term usage of nitro can help the players get out of situations ahead of the others but using a lot of nitro and thus score may cost him the game. There are different methods of gathering score (drafting, hitting objects, drifting) and some cars are more suited for a method then the other. Choosing the right car for the preferred method and playing out your strategy will make the player win the game.

name: I Got Sticky with a Femboy
summary: Anticipation makes the "heart" grow fonder.

name: iGun Pro
summary: Ultra-Realistic gun simulation including both motion blur and smoke with an easy to learn interface let users quickly begin using their collection. iGun Pro has a massive library of specs, history, usage, and statistics of all the firearms featured in the app. Determine your shooting experience with adjustable recoil, motion blur, and slow motion.

name: Ignited Steel: Mech Tactics
summary: Ignited Steel is a mech roguelike turn-based-tactics game. Manage a team of overheating old-tech mechs, more heat means more vulnerability and damage! Unravel the galaxy’s story as you travel from node to node, improving your mechs, acquiring new pilots, and defeat the sentient A.I. overlord!

name: I Get This Call Every Day
summary: A lightly filtered experience pulled from the creator's (now former) day job in a customer service call centre, made interactive in a point-&-click format. Lose politely, or lose spectacularly; the choice is yours.

name: Iggle Pop!
summary: A Pac-Man style maze game.

name: Ignis Corruption
summary: In this Procedural City-Building and Survival game, you must manage your resources, expand your village, assemble an army and destroy the source of evil, which changed the entire eco system of a land that was once prosperous and peaceful.

name: Igor: The Game
summary: Nintendo DS Port of "Igor: The Game."

name: Igor: The Game
summary:
Adventure through the Kingdom of Malaria, where Igor and his 3 companions Scamper, Brian, and Eva work together to save the land from King Malbert and his minions.
As you travel through Malaria, be sure to collect items such as bolts or secret skulls that contain special healing powers.

name: IGS Classic Arcade Collection
summary:
IGS classic arcade game is transplanted for the first time!
Integrate 8 IGS popular arcade games into one piece.
Support up to 4 people online combat!

name: iGun Pro 2
summary: Download the most realistic and comprehensive interactive gun encyclopedia ever created! Virtually fire the top weapons of the world and customize your weapons with attachments, camouflage patterns you can create, and entering those guns into global design contests. iGun Pro 2: The Ultimate Gun Application is a game truly worthy of the iGun Pro Franchise!

name: I Got Straddled by a Femboy
summary: You find yourself at the horse racetrack without any entertainment. Try to find something to do...

name: Igo-Shinan '94
summary: The final Igo-Shinan game for Famicom.

name: Ignis
summary: Ignis is a puzzle strategy game with the goal of burning down everything in your path, but totally chill. You control the spreading flames where strategic thinking is the difference between dying out or raging on.

name: Igo Shinan
summary: A Go simulator from Hect for the NES. It would be followed with four annualized sequels.

name: I Got Trapped in the Succubus's Dream!
summary: The protagonist, trapped in the succubus's dream, cannot wake up. The only way to escape is to navigate through the traps set within the dream and find the exit. If you fall into a trap, you must start over to escape. Escape from the dream and make your getaway.

name: Iggy's Reckin' Balls
summary: A vertical race up towering tracks. Iggy and the Reckin' Balls are in the race of their lives. A winner-take-all dash to the top of twisted, looped, warped and genuinely demented courses! Smash, crash and swing with Iggy, his friends, plus loads of secret characters. Over 100 tracks, tons of shortcuts, secret paths, loops and elevators. One to four player racing action with Battle and Versus mode.

name: Ignite: Dying Flame
summary: A complete remake of the developer's previous Yume Nikki fan game, Ignite, in which a black cat named Feutsuki explores his dreams by gazing into a fireplace.

name: Ignition
summary:
Ignition is an action packed racing game viewed from above and slightly behind the player. The cars on offer range from police car and VW Beetle to school bus and truck, each of which has its own strengths and weaknesses - trying to win with the bus, which involves blocking everyone behind the hideously slow vehicle for 3 laps, is perhaps the ultimate challenge.

Initially there are 5 tracks available, with practice and single race modes as well as full championship at 3 levels - winning each of the first 2 levels unlocks an extra track. They all have hazards running through them, and sections where you must make a split-second choice between the safer route and the risky but potentially rewarding one. Multiplayer can be done via network or by split-screen - in a break with convention the screen is split vertically rather than horizontally.
